definition: alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

pinyin: yan2 pi2 zhi4 lei4 gu4 chun2

sentences.english: VOICE: So it sounds as if anabolic steroids can be very destructive.
sentences.chinese: 所以，聽起來合成代謝類固醇的破壞性會很大。

sentences.english: "I would suggest they got a cholesterol test with these symptoms, " says Smith.
sentences.chinese: 有這此症狀的人，我會建議他們去檢查一下膽固醇。

sentences.english: They lower cholesterol and are recommended for prevention against atherosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 低膽固醇含量有助於阻止動脈硬化。

sentences.english: Tofu is as good as medicine for lowing cholesterol
sentences.chinese: 豆腐是一種類似低膽固醇的良藥。

sentences.english: This is good for reducing cholesterol.
sentences.chinese: 好蓮沱茶有助降低膽固醇。

sentences.english: Authorities say they discovered prescription steroids in the home of pro wrestler Chris Benoit.
sentences.chinese: 本諾伊特的家中發現了處方類固醇。

sentences.english: Find out if your overweight is leading to high  cholesterol, as it is known to do.
sentences.chinese: 發現你的超重是否如所知的那樣，已導致膽固醇偏高。

sentences.english: Steroids soared in popularity among high school students.
sentences.chinese: 固醇類藥物在高中生中的受歡迎程度急速串升。

sentences.english: A possible relationship exists between human aggressive behaviour and low serum cholesterol lev-el.
sentences.chinese: 人的攻擊行爲與血清膽固醇濃度偏低可能有關。

sentences.english: The open, needle-like aces in the atheromatous plaque are cholesterol clefts.
sentences.chinese: 在粥樣斑塊中看到的針狀空隙即爲膽固醇結晶。

sentences.english: And the use of cocaine, hallucinogens, steroids, and alcohol by America's youth are all on the decline.
sentences.chinese: 可卡因，迷幻藥，類固醇和酒精的使用也前面下降。

sentences.english: No wonder white-space is being referred to as “Wi-Fi on steroids”.
sentences.chinese: 難怪白色空間被稱爲“打了類固醇的WIFI”。

sentences.english: Plant stanols can safely be used with cholesterol lowering medication.
sentences.chinese: 植物甾醇可用來作爲安全降低膽固醇的藥物。

sentences.english: These foods are naturally fat- and cholesterol-free, as well as low in sodium.
sentences.chinese: 這些食品是不含脂肪和膽固醇的，鈉鹽含量也很低。

sentences.english: Most steroid users consider these effects as an inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 而大部分的類固醇使用者都認爲這些影響微不足道。

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1
dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4
